1.title: Nuxt vs Vue: Which should you pick for your app and why?
1.brief_desc: As a 3 year (and counting) Vue/Nuxt user, this is a question I have now been asked 3 times in interviews and embarrassingly stumble over every time. Admittedly, I didn't have a solid understanding of Nuxt vs Vue, but I finally decided to hunker down and answer this question.
